title: Wolf Freed
description: This ends here. It ends with us.After seeing the horrors Strand inflicted in the name of research, I thought they couldn’t surprise me anymore.I was wrong.When we learn the truth behind Doctor Shepherd’s experiments, it changes everything. Armed with that knowledge, we may finally have a way to end the Shifter Initiative once and for all.But even as we dig up Strand’s secrets and prepare for our final confrontation with them, I’m keeping a secret of my own. From my pack, and even worse… from my mates.When they find out what I’ve been hiding, will I lose everything I’ve been fighting for?Wolf Claimed is the thrilling conclusion to The Last Shifter series, a reverse harem story intended for ages 18+. This book contains strong language, violence, sexual situations, and a fierce heroine who doesn't have to choose between her men.
author: Sadie Moss
